attributes.action: Designate The H M T Lancastria a War Grave under the Protection of Military Remains Act 1986
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Lancastia Association of Scotland are to partition H M Government to have the troopship H M T Lancastria designated a War Grave under the PoMRAct1986.The Lancastria was bombed of St Nazaire France on 17th of June 1940 with the loss of 4to 5000 lives including Military personel and Civillian Women & Children. Since the freedom of Information The Scottish Parliament are to petition The Prime Minister to presented to 10 Downing Street. I Ex Lance Corporal with the Royal Engineers witnessed the bombing 
from the deck of H M S Highlander. My self and Sapper Tony Everett belive we are are the only ones that are left standing. Because of we are restricted in our travel we would like to support the petition which is to be presented by many dignataries and Mark Hurst Press Officer to the Scottish Parliament whose Grandfather was a survivor.We would like all who lost lives in the Greatest Maritime Disaster in WW2 be remembed with dignaty.
